doc.after: Cendrillon is an opera in four acts by Jules Massenet to a French libretto by Henri CaÃ¯n. Based on Charles Perrault's 1698 version of the Cinderella fairy tale, it follows a young woman who meets and falls in love with a prince owing to help from her fairy godmother. The opera has been performed numerous times since its 1899 premiere at the Salle Favart, and several recordings have been produced.
